notes.text:
High heat gives the best char
Serve on a sizzling hot plate for drama
Set up a fajita bar for interactive dining

steps.descr: Mix cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper

on_enter.say: Right, let's mix these lovely spices together - cumin, paprika, a pinch of salt, and pepper. This is going to be the flavour base for our chicken.

steps.instructions: Mix cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper

on_enter.say: Now, toss the chicken in that beautiful spice mix. Make sure every piece is well coated - this is where the magic happens!

steps.descr: Heat pan, cook chicken until golden

on_enter.say: Let's get the pan nice and hot. Add the chicken and cook it until it's beautifully golden and sizzling. You'll know it's ready when it smells irresistible!

steps.instructions: Heat pan, cook chicken until golden

steps.descr: Add peppers and onions, cook until soft

on_enter.say: Now, let's add the peppers and onions to the pan. Cook them until they're soft and vibrant. The colours should be popping!

steps.instructions: Add peppers and onions, cook until soft

steps.descr: Warm tortillas in a dry pan

on_enter.say: Let's warm up those tortillas in a dry pan. Just a few seconds on each side until they're nice and pliable.

steps.instructions: Warm tortillas in a dry pan

steps.descr: Serve chicken and veg with tortillas and toppings

on_enter.say: Time to serve up! Pile that delicious chicken and veg onto the warm tortillas. Add your favourite toppings - sour cream, guacamole, salsa - whatever you fancy!

steps.instructions: Serve chicken and veg with tortillas and toppings

on_enter.say: Let's finish it off with a squeeze of lime over everything. This will add a lovely zing to your fajitas!

recipe.title: Chicken Fajitas
recipe.description: Sizzling Mexican chicken with peppers and warm tortillas
